subject: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Dear Jesse

Greetings to you and your family, I hope you and your family are in good
health? I thank you so much for  replying  my mail, I am Dr Hassan Mohamed
  the Chairman Contract Award committee of the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST
AFRICAN STATES (ECOWAS)with Headquarters in Lome,Togo.  I have emailed you
earlier without a response. In my mail i mentioned that  if you  can  help
us  repatriate the sun of $35.5million dollars to your oversea account
based on percentage.

You will be required to assist us  in the following
(1) Assist in the transfer of the said sum
(2) Advise on lucrative areas for investment
(3) Assist me in purchase of properties.

 We shall be considering several sectors with our main focus on Government
Bonds, Property Development, Loan and Equity Financing for small and medium
sized companies.
I am waiting for your kind and urgent response. And I have attached my
family photos for your view .

BELOW My Personal Data's:
My  Country,Lome Togo
West Africa. My full name Dr Bello Mustafa
My Wife Name Mrs. Marriam  Awa Mustafa
  one boy a
My House Address, No 17 Deacon Street
Lome Togo  West Africa.
My Position Bill And Exchange Manager/
 Chairman Contract Award committee
 of the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST
AFRICAN STATES (ECOWAS)with Headquarters
 in Lome,
My E-mail (bellomustafa@gmail.com)

Regards,

Dr Bello Mustafa  .
This Is My Direct Line And I want You To Call Me After Reading My
Details +228  98 46 97 51

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

I hope this message finds you well. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance and I appreciate the details you've shared with me. Your family photos are lovely, thank you for sharing them.

Your proposal sounds interesting, but I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions or investments. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this process works? What would my role be exactly in assisting with the transfer of the said sum?

Also, could you provide some more information on the areas of investment you mentioned? Government Bonds, Property Loan and Equity Financing sound intriguing but I'd love to know more about how they work and what kind of returns they might offer.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance! I hope you and your family are doing well in Togo, West Africa. Your position as the Bill And Exchange Manager and Chairman Contract Award committee of the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST AFRICAN STATES ECOWAS sounds very important.

I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm not entirely sure I understand it fully. Could you please explain a bit more about what exactly you need assistance with? How would the transfer of funds work? And what kind of investments are we talking about?

Also, could you tell me more about the sectors you're interested in? Government Bonds, Property Loan and Equity Financing for small and medium sized companies sound like big areas to focus on.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

I hope this message finds you well. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance and I appreciate the detailed information you've provided about yourself and your family. Your position as Bill And Exchange Manager and Chairman Contract Award committee of the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST AFRICAN STATES ECOWAS sounds very important.

I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions or investments. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this process works? What exactly would my role be in assisting with the transfer of funds? 

Also, could you provide some more details about the investment areas you mentioned? What kind of government bonds are we talking about? And what does equity financing for small and medium-sized companies entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Dear Jesse

Greetings to you and your family, I hope you and your family are in good
health?  I thank you so much for the interest that made you to reply my
mail,   , I wish to inform you that if you can assist me in this project
will never be disappointed I am Dr Bello Mustafa    the Chairman Contract
Award committee of the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST AFRICAN STATES
(ECOWAS)with Headquarters in Lome,Togo. I contacted you sir, for an agent
to assist me in the transfer of (US$35.5 MILLION) Thirty  Five      Million
Five  Hundred Thousand UNITED STATES DOLLARS.

 We wish to transfer the sum of (US$35.5 MILLION) Thirty Five    â€“  Million
Five  Hundred Thousand  UNITED STATES DOLLARS into your personal or
company's bank account. This fund was a residue of the over invoiced
contract bills awarded by us for the Electrification of urban and rural
areas, supply of hard/software, pharmaceutical products/medical
equipment's, light and heavy duty vehicles, apparels for the ECOMOG in
Sierra-Leone and Liberia during the Peace Keeping Projects.

This DEAL was deliberately hatched out and carefully protected with all the
attendant lope holes sealed. As the Chairman of Chairman of Contract award
Committee (CAC) I have the cooperation and mandate of the Financial
Director and the Secretary of the Organization. We arranged and over
invoiced the contract funds supplied by different companies from different
countries during the crisis. It was our consensus to seek the assistance of
a willing foreigner to provide us with the facilities to transfer this
money out of West Africa. This is borne out of our belief in the non-stable
and porous political nature of this sub-region.

The original contractors have been dully paid by the Banque Centrale Des
Etats De L`Afrique De L`Ouest (Central Bank of the West African States)
through our bank BANK OF AFRICA (BOA )  (BOA), LOME TOGO. This balance is
suspended in the escrow accounts awaiting claims by any foreign company of
our choice. We intend to pay out this fund now as the organization is
winding up its activities since the aim of returning PEACE to the countries
and the coast has been achieved.

Based on the laws and ethics of employment, we as civil servants working
under this organization, are not allowed to operate a foreign account. This
is the more reason why we needed your assistance to provide an account that
can hold this fund for safe keeping and our future investment with your
able advice, assistance and partnership in
your country.

It is however agreed, as the account owner in this deal to allow you 40% of
the entire sum as compensation, 50% will be held on trust for us and 10 %
 will go for charity organization    This transaction will be successfully
concluded within seven    days if you accord us your unalloyed and due
cooperation. Please if you are really interested and willing to execute
this project, kindly indicate so that i can send you the copy of the
application form which you will fill out with your account details and send
to the office of the foreign contract verification and investigation panel
for payment approval. In your next reply i will like you to forward the
following.

YOUR PERSONAL ADDRESS,
TELEPHONE AND FAX NUMBERS.(if available)
YOUR   OCCUPATION
YOUR AGE

I am waiting for your kind and urgent response.

BELOW My Personal Data's:

My Country,Lome Togo West Africa.

My full name  Dr Bello Mustafa
My Wife Name Mrs.Marriam  Awa Mustafa
My House Address,No 17 Deacon Street
Lome Togo  West Africa.
My Position Bill And Exchange Manager and
 Chairman Contract Award
 committee of the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY
 OF WESTAFRICAN STATES (ECOWAS)with
Headquarters in Lome,Togo.
My E-mail (bellomustafa55@gmail.com)

Regards,

Dr Bello Mustafa.
This Is My Direct Line And I want You To Call Me After Reading My
Details +228  91052495
My Home Address: No' 602 Ave. LOUDUN
              B:P 3508
Lome Togo , West Africa.

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

I hope this message finds you well. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance and I appreciate the trust you've placed in me by sharing such detailed information about this project.

The project sounds quite interesting, but I must admit, it's a lot to take in at once. Could you perhaps break down the process for me? How exactly would my involvement work?

Also, could you tell me more about the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST AFRICAN STATES (ECOWAS)? What kind of projects do they usually undertake? And how did they come to have such a large sum left over from their contracts?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but as you can imagine, this is not an everyday occurrence for me. I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Dear Mr Jesse

My greetings to you and your family I hope you all are in good health, it
is my pleasure to read your mail and I thank you very much for your kind
explanations more importantly the interest you have indicated in assisting
me in this venture.

According to your question to m as I quote  Also, could you tell me more
about the ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST AFRICAN STATES (ECOWAS)?

The Economic Community Of West  African States (ECOWAS) is a regional group
of fifteen countries, founded in  1975. Its mission is to promote peace
and  economic integration in "all fields of economic activity, particularly
industry, transport, telecommunications, health ,  energy, agriculture,
natural resources, commerce, monetary and financial  questions, social and
cultural matters, so the over invoice came out when they  help Liberia and
serrielone in supplying them of vehicles ,pharmaceutical product ,energy
to promote peace in there country.



Please I am willing to work you  but let me throw more light on this
project,  this contract has been fully executed ,completed and all the
local and foreign contractor companies paid off only this over invoiced
contract sum of $35.5 million is awaiting claim ,however I have contacted
you to come and stand as the sub- contractor who executed the contract of
this $35.5 million yet to be paid and this will require presentation of
your company certificate of in cooperation I do not know if you have any
registered firm which we can use to claim this fund; Do you have any
company or firm ? which we can use to claim the fund.

I will like you to understand the nature of the transaction i have involved
you, this is an over invoiced contract sum and i have invited you to come
and use your registered company to present as one of the sub-contractor
company who executed this over invoiced contract of 35,500,000.00 USD and
yet to be paid   it is an over invoiced contract sum which has been in the
paying bank since 3 years now.

The foreign and local contractor companies has been paid and the government
has been waiting for the contractor company who executed this contract of
 35, 500,000.00 USD to apply for the release of the said amount, i am
 involving you so that we can use  your company to receive the fund and  to
approve your company as the original contractor company and beneficiary of
this fund  35,500,000.00 USD. There is no risky involve at all .

I will need to send you an official application form which you are going to
fill and send to the foreign contract verification department of the West
African Monetary Agency to commence with the payment approval while I am
here to guide and provide you with all the required details and documents
and .

So  kindly get back to me so that i will forward to you the wama
application form which you are going to fill and send to  wama for the
approval of the payment in your favor.



Dr Bello Mustafa

whatsup 00228 910 52495

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the Economic Community Of West African States (ECOWAS) and the role it plays in promoting peace and economic growth in the region. It's fascinating to learn about such initiatives.

I'm intrigued by this project you've mentioned, involving an over-invoiced contract sum. However, I must admit that I'm not entirely clear on some aspects of it. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this process works? 

For instance, what does it mean for a contract to be 'over-invoiced'? And why has this particular sum been left unclaimed for so long? Also, could you clarify what my role would be in claiming this fund?

I appreciate your patience with my questions. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / Greetings From Dr Bello Mustafa
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed explanation about the Economic Community Of West African States (ECOWAS) and its mission to promote peace and economic growth in various fields of activity. It's quite interesting to learn about their involvement in helping Liberia and Sierra Leone.

Regarding the over-invoiced contract sum, I must admit that it's a new concept for me. So, if I understand correctly, this is an unclaimed amount from a contract that was executed years ago? And you're suggesting that my company could be presented as the one who executed this contract?

I don't own any registered firm or company at the moment. However, I'm intrigued by your proposal and would like to understand more about it. Could you please explain how this process works? What kind of responsibilities would be involved on my part? 

Also, you mentioned a form from the West African Monetary Agency (WAMA). Could you tell me more about WAMA and its role in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME
body:
Dear Mr Jesse

Sir, I wish you and your family happy  day ahead , my humble greetings to
you and your family I am very glad to read your email and I thank you very
much for the interest you have indicated to handle this venture even if you
do not have a registered company but you have shown so much interest and I
have decided to work with you and to make sure this fund is invested in
your country.

Regarding to your question to me as i quote  Regarding the over-invoiced
contract sum, I must admit that it's a new concept for me. So, if I
understand correctly, this is an unclaimed amount from a contract that was
executed years ago? And you're suggesting that my company could be
presented as the one who executed this contract? answer  yes

More importantly we are going to use this company (ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP,
LTD) to claim this fund as the sub-contractor contractor company to the
original contractor companies who executed this contract.

I have agreed with the president of this company 40% will go for you, 50%
will be for me and 10% will go to the owner of (ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP, LTD)
for using his company to claim this fund while the fund will be transferred
in your account .

so you have to fill this company name (ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP, LTD) where
they write CEO   in the application  and send to the office of Dr Danjuma
Komo at (wama.agency@contractor.net)

 I want you to understand that (ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP, LTD) did not execute
this contract but with the help of the lawyer all contract documents will
be procured in the name of (ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP, LTD)  as one of the
sub-contractor who executed the contract of this $35.5 million dollars yet
to be paid.

I am going to ensure that the payment approval  is issued in favor of
(ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP, LTD)  and payment effected in to your own account,
but you must assure maximum cooperation and also keep constant
communication with me, always forward every letter you received from the
approval office to me so that I can direct you on what to do to avoid any
mistake from your side.

As soon as the payment is approved in the name of (ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP,
LTD) , the copy of the approval letter will be issued to you to contact the
paying bank for the remittance on the fund in to your account which you
filled in the application form which you submitted to the office of
DR.DANJUMA KOMO.

I humbly want to reassure you risk free transfer of this fund into your
account if you can follow my instructions. You are going to fill this
company name CEO  ETS.PREEDON W/A CORP, LTD  in  application form and And
return back to me for my proper verification to avoid mistake before i will
give you go ahead order to  send the filled copy and certificate of
incorporation  to the office of DR.DANJUMA KOMO through this email address (
wama.agency@contractor.net) and get me informed so that I can follow up
your application and make sure your application is given urgent attention.

 Extend my greetings to your family
Have a nice day
 Thanks
Dr. Bello Mustafa

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME
body:
Dear Dr. Bello Mustafa,

Thank you for your detailed explanation and the trust you have placed in me. I am truly humbled by this opportunity.

I understand that we will be using the company CORP, LTD to claim this fund as if it were the original contractor. This is indeed a unique situation, but I am ready to follow your guidance.

However, I do have a few questions to ensure I fully comprehend our arrangement:

1. Could you please explain more about how the lawyer will procure all contract documents in the name of CORP, LTD? 
2. What kind of assurance do you need from me regarding maximum cooperation?
3. How can we ensure that there won't be any mistakes on my side when forwarding letters from the approval office?

I appreciate your patience with my queries and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Wishing you and your family a wonderful day!

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME
body:
Dear Mr Jesse

According to your question number one as I quote  (Could you please explain
more about how the lawyer will procure all contract documents in the name
of CORP, LTD? Because you donâ€™t have a company so we will be using the
company name to get the fund transferred to your account that is why I send
the certificate of the incorporation to you .

The certificate of incorporation and wama well filed application form by
you  will be send together  to west Africa monetary agency wama  for the
immediate approving of the fund in your favor,but if you have a company
good ,we will use your company to get the fund transferred to your account .

According to your question number two  as I quote  .( What kind of
assurance do you need from me regarding maximum cooperation?    Assurance
 that you will not betrayal me as soon as the fund hit your account because
the deal will be concluded within seven working days immediate the wama
receive your application form .

     According to your question number three  as I quote  .( How can we
ensure that there won't be    any mistakes on my side when forwarding

There wont be because you will always receive go ahead from me first before
forwarding anything for approval , you should not worry about that .anything
for approval , you should not worry about that as i will be guiding you on

Thanks

Dr Bello Mustafa

.

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME
body:
Hello Dr. Bello Mustafa,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time you took to explain everything to me.

Regarding the first point, I understand that my company name will be used to transfer the funds. However, could you please clarify what documents or information would be required from my side for this process? 

As for your second point, I assure you that I have no intention of betraying anyone. But could you please elaborate on how we can ensure maximum assurance? Is there any specific procedure or agreement we need to follow?

Also, when you mention "wama", are you referring to a specific agency or department? Could you provide more details about their role in this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME
body:
Dear Mr Jesse

Hopefully you are in a good health today ,Thank you so much for  your well
noted message ,Regarding your question number one to me as I quote
(Regarding the first point, I understand that my company name will be used
to transfer the funds. However, could you please clarify what documents or
information would be required from my side for this process?

The documents we need from you now  to start this process is your
certificate of incorporation of your company if you have and  your account
details information which you will fill  in the wama application form,
other documents will  be requested by the wama which  I donâ€™t know the
exactly documents they will required from you   that will back up the claim
which is procurable from here .

According to your second question to me as I quote (As for your second
point, I assure you that I have no intention of betraying anyone. But could
you please elaborate on how we can ensure maximum assurance? Is there any
specific procedure or agreement we need to follow?

Thank you so much for your assurance  of trust  I really appreciate you for
that ,  we can go into  MOU agreement   as to enable us secure more
maximum   trust and  assurance .

Therefore  fill wama application form and resend back to me for my proper
verification to avoid mistake before I will give you go ahead to send it
to  wama for the immediate approval of the fund in your favor  , also I
will use your address information and telephone number from the application
you will fill to prepare for the MOU agreement for the deal .

Regarding your number three question to me as I quote (  Also, when you
mention "wama", are you referring to a specific agency or department? Could
you provide more details about their role in this process?



 (WAMA) is  West African Monetary Agency  an autonomous and specialized
agency of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS).it is an
agency under ECOWAS  It was established in 1996 as a result of the
transformation of the West African Clearing House

 In retrospect, WAMA  was established in 1996 to serve as a multilateral
payment facility and contract payments  and  to promote trade within the
West African sub-region. In addition to its functions of routing and
clearing trade transactions and services,

The key objectives assigned to the Agency are as follows:

 To promote the use of national currencies in trade and non-trade
transactions within the sub-region  To bring about savings in the use of
member Statesâ€™ foreign reserves;

 To encourage and promote trade and exchange liberalization among member
States; To enhance monetary cooperation and consultation among member
States;

To award new contracts to countries in  ECOWAS region and also pay old
contracts payments To ensure the monitoring, coordination and
implementation of the ECOWAS Monetary Cooperation Programmed;

 To initiate and promote policies and programmes relating to monetary
integration in the sub-region;

.

Meanwhile i have started preparing the MOU agreement letter so i will be
waiting to receive the filled wama application form from you to finalize it
.
Thanks

Dr Bello

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME
body:
Hello Dr. Bello,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time you took to explain everything so thoroughly.

I understand that you need some documents from me to start this process, but could you please specify which ones exactly? You mentioned a proof of my company and account details, but I'm not sure what kind of proof you're referring to. Could it be a business license or something else?

Regarding the MOU agreement, could you please elaborate on what it entails? What are the terms and conditions we would be agreeing upon? 

Also, thank you for explaining about WAMA. It sounds like an important agency with significant responsibilities. However, I'm curious as to how our transaction fits into their role of promoting trade within West Africa. Could you provide more insight into this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: Dear Jesse / FILL THE APPLICATION FORM AND RETURN BACK TO ME

body:

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better.

Best wishes,
Jesse
